job_details.Functieomschrijving:
The Generative Models team is part of the AI Product Line at HubSpot and partners closely with the Generative AI Platform team to deliver the next generation of internally trained and fine-tuned Large Language Models., * Design and develop machine learning models and tooling for pre-training and/or fine-tuning open source large language models.
     * Experience with the modern LLM stack incl. Retrieval augmented generation, parameter efficient fine-tuning, LoRA, etc.
     * Implement and deploy machine learning algorithms in a scalable and efficient manner, working closely with software engineers
     * Collaborate with product managers to define and refine requirements and use cases for conversation intelligence.
     * Analyze and preprocess data from a variety of sources including numeric, text and other mediums
     * Conduct experiments and evaluations of machine learning models, using statistical methods and visualization tools to assess performance and identify areas for improvement
     * Keep up to date with the latest research and trends in Generative AI, and contribute to the development of new algorithms and techniques
     * Participate in code reviews, testing, and documentation activities, ensuring high quality and maintainability of the codebase
     * Experience or interest in mentoring other team members and proactively sharing knowledge
job_details.full_text:
Sr. Machine Learning Engineer II

The Generative Models team is part of the AI Product Line at HubSpot and partners closely with the Generative AI Platform team to deliver the next generation of internally trained and fine-tuned Large Language Models., * Design and develop machine learning models and tooling for pre-training and/or fine-tuning open source large language models.
     * Experience with the modern LLM stack incl. Retrieval augmented generation, parameter efficient fine-tuning, LoRA, etc.
     * Implement and deploy machine learning algorithms in a scalable and efficient manner, working closely with software engineers
     * Collaborate with product managers to define and refine requirements and use cases for conversation intelligence.
     * Analyze and preprocess data from a variety of sources including numeric, text and other mediums
     * Conduct experiments and evaluations of machine learning models, using statistical methods and visualization tools to assess performance and identify areas for improvement
     * Keep up to date with the latest research and trends in Generative AI, and contribute to the development of new algorithms and techniques
     * Participate in code reviews, testing, and documentation activities, ensuring high quality and maintainability of the codebase
     * Experience or interest in mentoring other team members and proactively sharing knowledge

profile_classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes working with Large Language Models (LLMs), including fine-tuning, Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG), and parameter-efficient fine-tuning (PEFT). The core responsibilities involve designing, developing, and deploying ML models and tooling specifically for generative AI, aligning perfectly with the definition of a GenAI Engineer.

phrases: Design and develop machine learning models and tooling for pre-training and/or fine-tuning open source large language models.
Experience with the modern LLM stack incl. Retrieval augmented generation, parameter efficient fine-tuning, LoRA, etc.
Implement and deploy machine learning algorithms in a scalable and efficient manner
Conduct experiments and evaluations of machine learning models, using statistical methods and visualization tools to assess performance and identify areas for improvement
Keep up to date with the latest research and trends in Generative AI, and contribute to the development of new algorithms and techniques
job_tasks.justification: These phrases directly relate to the creation, training, adaptation, and evaluation of machine learning models, with a specific focus on generative models like LLMs, RAG, and fine-tuning techniques.

phrases: Implement and deploy machine learning algorithms in a scalable and efficient manner, working closely with software engineers
Participate in code reviews, testing, and documentation activities, ensuring high quality and maintainability of the codebase
job_tasks.justification: This task involves building and integrating AI features into applications, ensuring scalability, efficiency, and maintainability through code reviews, testing, and documentation, which are core software development practices.

phrases: Analyze and preprocess data from a variety of sources including numeric, text and other mediums
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the essential steps of preparing and cleaning data from various sources, which is a fundamental part of data engineering for model training.

phrases: Implement and deploy machine learning algorithms in a scalable and efficient manner
Participate in code reviews, testing, and documentation activities, ensuring high quality and maintainability of the codebase
job_tasks.justification: The emphasis on implementing and deploying algorithms in a scalable and efficient manner, along with code reviews, testing, and documentation, points to the operational aspects of managing models in production.

phrases: Collaborate with product managers to define and refine requirements and use cases for conversation intelligence.
job_tasks.justification: This involves understanding business needs and translating them into technical requirements by collaborating with product managers, which is a key aspect of business understanding.

phrases: Keep up to date with the latest research and trends in Generative AI
contribute to the development of new algorithms and techniques
Design and develop machine learning models and tooling
Implement and deploy machine learning algorithms in a scalable and efficient manner
Conduct experiments and evaluations of machine learning models
assess performance and identify areas for improvement
contribute to the development of new algorithms and techniques
